entry.title: Kinect Sports: Season Two
entry.description: The BAFTA award winning game that I helped ship by implementing the 'Challenge Play' gameplay mode including the user interface and save system for local challenge play.

link.name: Rare's Website
link.description: Rare's Studio Website showing the game!

link.name: Challenge Play Review
link.description: A website reviewing KS2's new UI

link.name: Challenge Play Video
link.description: A video tutorial showing how Challenge Play works

link.name: Kinect Sports: Season Two BAFTA success
link.description: Rare celebrates the BAFTA award

entry.title: WikiTime
entry.description: My third year project which places all of the historical events mentioned on Wikipedia on a searchable Timeline interface. The main challenge with the project was processing the whole of Wikipedia so a backend processing system was written to distribute the extraction algorithm over multiple machines and multiple threads.

link.name: WikiTime Project Homepage
link.description: The WikiTime project homepage

entry.title: Space Demo
entry.description: A small graphics demo written in C++ using SDL and OpenGL which shows a collection of procedurally animated spaceships flying around a procedurally generated planet.

link.name: Space Demo Download
link.description: The link containing the Space graphics demo

entry.title: Trapped
entry.description: A game entered into Ludum Dare 22 which had the theme 'Alone'. Ludum Dare is a 48 hour game development competition. You must escape from a lonely castle. All design, art and code was created by me within 48 hours.

link.name: Play the Game!
link.description: Requires Unity Player to be installed on your browser to run.

entry.title: Timeline
entry.description: An app that was thrown together for the Discovery Developer Competition which displays all of the photos from the National Archives via Flickr.

link.name: Timeline
link.description: The entry. Requires Flash Player to run.

link.name: Discovery Developer Competition
link.description: The competition page.

link.name: National Archives
link.description: The UK National Archives Website

link.name: National Archives Flickr
link.description: The National Archives account on Flickr

entry.title: Detour
entry.description: An Indie game developed in XNA and C#. I wrote the entire graphics pipeline, and implemented the runtime graphics code and shader effects.

link.name: Sandswept Studios
link.description: The Sandswept Studios website

entry.title: PlayWithYourPeas
entry.description: A game written individually in C++/DirectX using art and design from Danc at lostgarden.com. You must build a map for peas to bounce around allowing them to score happy points!

link.name: Game Installer
link.description: This installer will install the game and any prerequisites automatically!

link.name: Game Source
link.description: The full source code of the game!

entry.title: Fractal
entry.description: A fractal explorer that can draw the Mandelbrot, Julia, Burning Ship and Nova Fractal at realtime rates.

link.name: DirectX Executable
link.description: Requires the latest DirectX Update to be installed.

link.name: XNA Package
link.description: Requires XNA 3.1 Redistributable to be installed.

entry.title: Book Galaxy
entry.description: The winning entry of the JISC MOSAIC Developer Competition. It displays library usage data and library books in a new and interesting way.

link.name: Book Galaxy Page
link.description: The winning entry! Requires Java 6 Runtime to run.

link.name: Developer Competition Page
link.description: The page describing the Developer Competition

link.name: Library Stats made to sparkle
link.description: Who'd have thought library statistics could be so much fun? Alex Parker's free Book Galaxy Applet creates a rivetting search universe out of bog-standard library data

link.name: Source Code
link.description: The source code is available on SourceForge.

entry.title: The Expanse
entry.description: An XNA Game written for the DreamBuildPlay 2009 competition. It is a 2D space exploration game where you must mine resources, evade pirates and upgrade your ship!

link.name: Windows Executable
link.description: Needs to have XNA Redistributable 3.0 installed. The package will then unpack itself and allow you to run it.

link.name: Xbox Executable
link.description: Needs to have XNA installed, with a Creators Club membership to deploy to Xbox.
